attributes.action: Reinstatement of a UHF Citizens Band Radio frequency
attributes.additional_details:
Reinstatement of a UHF Citizens Band Radio frequency

That a frequency to replace the former 934 MHz Citizen's Band Radio is made available on the unused radio spectrum above 905 MHz. The 934 MHz band was closed due to the new cellular frequencies, users were told that a short range digital radio system on there would be made available.  That did not happen.  However there is unused radio frequency available (as mentioned) for a Citizen's Band service.
